title: About Me

intro.name: Neil Surridge
intro.summary1: Hello! I'm a developer returning to the tech world after leading teams, coordinating operations, and building the kind of decision-making skills you only acquire through real-world problem-solving. My focus now is on modern web development using TypeScript, React, Tailwind CSS, C#, .NET, and Azure.
intro.summary2: I previously worked as a Software Engineer specialising in Visual C++, telecommunications and medical systems, and I'm now blending that technical foundation with the leadership and analytical skills gained from my career journey since.

earlyCareer.overview: My early career was spent building high-performance applications, contributing to systems in both telecoms and medical domains. I worked primarily with Visual C++ and developed a strong foundation in systems programming, debugging, and designing robust software under demanding constraints.

careerShift.overview: After several successful years in software engineering, I moved into a new career path where I developed significant experience in leadership, decision-making under pressure, communication and team coordination. I currently serve in a supervisory role, further developing people-focused and operational skills that complement my technical background.

currentFocus.statement: I'm now purposefully moving back into software development and modern engineering practices. This portfolio documents that journey and serves as both a learning space and a showcase of progress. I have a fulltime role outside of software development, so learning and projects are pursued during evenings and weekends.

technical: Frontend development with React and TypeScript
Modern tooling: Vite, npm, Git, GitHub

goals: Build a polished, responsive portfolio site
Showcase GitHub projects fetched dynamically from the API
Strengthen knowledge of modern .NET and Azure services
Demonstrate continuous growth while transitioning fully back into development
